import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Card, Grid, Image } from "semantic-ui-react"; import holodemo from "./media/A0355.jpg"; import posterdemo from "./media/posterdemo.gif"; const project_info = [ { link: "/wordposterproject", img_src: { posterdemo }, header: "the Little Word Poster", date: "Feburary 2021", description: "interactive poster that outputs a random phrase after hearing \ a clap or seeing a face", }, { link: "/spotifyproject", img_src: "https://miro.medium.com/max/3200/1*c0FaLqy4tcO1uuYLP8AWBw.jpeg", header: "Spotify Ultimate Playlist", date: "June 2020", description: "using two user's spotify playlists and saved songs, this \ project will create an ultimate playlist with songs from both \ of their music libraries.", }, { link: "/holoproject", img_src: { holodemo }, header: "Holographic Audio Visualizer", date: "January 2020", description: "this is a pseudo-hologram that syncs visuals to the current \ music playing from SoundCloud.", }, ]; class Projects extends Component { render() { return (
Spotify Ultimate Playlist June 2020 using two user's spotify playlists and saved songs, this project will create an ultimate playlist with songs from both of their music libraries. the Little Word Poster Feburary 2021 interactive poster that outputs a random phrase after hearing a clap or seeing a face Holographic Audio Visualizer January 2020 this is a pseudo-hologram that syncs visuals to the current music playing from SoundCloud.
); } } export default Projects;
